meanings.sent1: The temporally changes in the weather patterns were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The temporally sensitive clock accurately displayed the hours and minutes.
meanings.sent3: The temporally themed party decorations were a hit with the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her temporally shifting moods made it hard to predict her reactions.
meanings.sent5: The temporally marked calendar helped keep track of important dates.

meanings.sent1: The sale on electronics is temporally available at the store.
meanings.sent2: The discount offer is temporally valid until the end of the month.
meanings.sent3: The store's temporally reduced prices attracted many customers.
meanings.sent4: The opportunity to travel abroad was temporally open to students.
meanings.sent5: The temporally offered promotion created a buzz among shoppers.

meanings.definition: in a way that is temporary
meanings.sent1: The repair was done temporally until a permanent solution could be found.
meanings.sent2: She only stayed temporally at her friend's house before finding her own place.
meanings.sent3: The temporally patched tire held up until they reached the mechanic.
meanings.sent4: The tent was set up temporally for the camping trip.
meanings.sent5: The temporally arranged seating was quickly rearranged for the event.
